message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a special price of $120. I believe it's a great deal, what do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle on $105? It's a very fair offer considering the value you'll be getting.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $95. Would you be willing to go that low?
